settings.text:
Wondering where to start with denim? Collins recommends the Jones jean. "There are loads of great denim silhouettes on the market, but if you’re looking for a versatile pick, this high-waisted straight-leg pair is the smart choice."
We're all about the jeans + heel uniform and Collins breaks down how to pull it off: "There’s something about the juxtaposition of the laid-back, boyish appeal of denim against a pretty pair of heels that just hits. While the weather is still warm, a pointed toe mule works perfectly, and as the temperatures cool for fall, a heeled bootie is a fashion editor-approved choice."

settings.title: Holiday Style with Kat Collings
settings.text: Wondering how the editor-in-chief of Who What Wear gets dressed for a holiday party? The answer is head-to-toe L’AGENCE.

Wondering where to start with denim? Collins recommends the Jones jean. "There are loads of great denim silhouettes on the market, but if you’re looking for a versatile pick, this high-waisted straight-leg pair is the smart choice."
We're all about the jeans + heel uniform and Collins breaks down how to pull it off: "There’s something about the juxtaposition of the laid-back, boyish appeal of denim against a pretty pair of heels that just hits. While the weather is still warm, a pointed toe mule works perfectly, and as the temperatures cool for fall, a heeled bootie is a fashion editor-approved choice."

Nail the easy elegance of the season à la Kat Collings by starting with the Lorenza—the ultra wide-leg jean loved by editors and influencers alike. It’s the perfect day-to-night essential, combining the ease of denim with the sleek look of a palazzo trouser. Pair with any blouse for a chic solution to holiday dressing.
